name: Cost of Life: N.E.O.N.
description:
Cost of Life: N.E.O.N. is a rougelike top down shooter made for Juice Jam II.

In this game killing costs you in game money, so you gotta be careful when to kill because at the end of  each floor you will pay your debt with your life! Progress in randomly generated dungeons and survive as much as you can.

#CONTROLES#

Mouse - Aim

WASD - Movement

LMB - Shoot

RMB - Slash (You can also cancel your dash with it.)

Space - Dash (You can also kill enemies with it!)

Credits:

Kenny's particle pack.

Google Fonts for some icons and font used.

Engine Used: Godot v3.5.1-stable

ChipTone usud for sound effects

My Thoughts:

It is decent i guess, it lacks some juice and variety honetly.

Can't expect much from a jam game of a hobbyist solo dev it is hopefully fun atleast.

Sorry for no mac support it didn't let me export it for some reason.
